data.news_body: This is to inform that the meeting of the Board of Directors of our Company was held today i.e. Tuesday, 24th May 2022, which commenced at 2:30 pm and concluded at 5.40 pm. In the said meeting, the Board, inter alia, approved the audited financial results (standalone and consolidated) for the quarter and year ended on 31st March 2022.

data.caption: Revised Disclosure Of Related Party Transactions
data.news_body:
With reference to the disclosure of related party transaction for half year ended 31st March 2021 submitted by the Company on 21st July 2021, we hereby wish to submit a revised disclosure of related party transaction of the company on a consolidated basis and balances for the half year ended 31st March 2021 pursuant to Regulation 23(9) of SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015.

We regret the inconvenience and request you to kindly take the above revised file on record.

data.caption: Disclosure Of Related Party Transaction
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 23(9) of SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015, enclosed herewith please find disclosure on Related Party Transactions of the Company on a consolidated basis and balances for the half year ended 31st March 2021.

data.caption: Audited Financial Results (Standalone And Consolidated) For The Quarter And Financial Year Ended 31St March 2021
data.news_body: This is to inform that the meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company was held today i.e. Friday, 25th June 2021, which commenced at 2:30 pm and concluded at 7:30 pm. Kindly refer to the attached file containing Audited Financial Results (Standalone and Consolidated) for the quarter and financial year ended 31st March 2021.
